name: places/ChIJ24eUVpdZwokRkZrCESP1we4
formattedAddress: 13 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
Practically located in Greenwich Village of New York, Luxury Apartments Greenwich Village features barbecue facilities. The accommodation is 1 km from the Flatiron Building.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with a kitchen, a seating area, and a satellite flat-screen TV. The bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Bloomingdales is a 14-minute walk from the apartment. LaGuardia Airport is 11 km from the property.

text.text:
Practically located in Greenwich Village of New York, Luxury Apartments Greenwich Village features barbecue facilities. The accommodation is 1 km from the Flatiron Building.

originalText.text: I just got back from a 7 month stay at 13 East 9th Street. I loved it there. It was a real home from home. My air conditioned apartment was beautifully appointed, with a marble bathroom, kitchen, sofa bed, balcony and the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in ! I've even ordered one of those mattresses (Dreambed Lux) and am having it shipped to London ! Rebecca, the Landlady, was super helpful, "checking me in" on arrival. Throughout the stay, nothing was too much trouble. If I needed extra towels, pillows, or anything needed fixing, it was done the same day. Mariesela will clean the apartment for a small extra fee, but it was so worth it, as the place would be gleaming when I got home. Greenwich Village is my favorite neighborhood, and the apartment couldn't be better placed. There are so many great restaurants right on your doorstep, plus a dry cleaners and supermarket just around the corner. My favorite part of the day was getting home in the evening and sitting on my balcony overlooking the rear gardens and apartments opposite. It was just like "Rear Window" ! I will definitely be staying at 13 East 9th Street again

originalText.text: Do NOT rent here. Rebecca will not honor your agreement, she will sublease your room without permission and keep your deposits. Horrible, horrible experience.
